MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH8 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:11pm. Our emergency response team are on their way to the Willowbrae substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:26pm on Saturday, 24 April 2021
